dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8539 IH: Housing Access Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself, Mr. Carbajal, Ms. Chu, Ms. Eshoo, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Lieu, Ms. Lofgren, and Mr. Swalwell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To increase the percentage of authorized units that a public housing agency may use for project-based assistance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Housing Access Improvement Act.
Section 8(o)(13)(B)(i) of the United States Housing Act of 1937 (42 U.S.C. 1437f(o)(13)) is amended by striking not more than 20 percent and inserting not more than 50 percent.
